text: Brachystelma schultzei is a species of plant in the family Apocynaceae. It is endemic to Namibia. Its natural habitat is dry savanna. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== schultzi Category:Endemic flora of Namibia Category:Least concern plants Category:Least concern biota of Africa Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Brachystelma schultzei
